revision.comment: Possibly the last time I tidy up this article: Mexico also standardized the size of its license plates at 6" x 12" in 1956
revision.text:
The [[Territories of the United States|U.S. unincorporated territory]] of [[Guam]] first required its residents to register their [[motor vehicle]]s and display [[Vehicle registration plate|license plate]]s in 1916. In 1956, the United States, Canada and Mexico came to an agreement with the [[American Association of Motor Vehicle Administrators]], the [[Automobile Manufacturers Association]] and the [[National Safety Council]] that standardized the size for license plates for vehicles (except those for [[motorcycle]]s) at {{convert|6|in|cm}} in height by {{convert|12|in|cm}} in width, with standardized mounting holes.{{cite magazine |last=Garrish |first=Christopher |date=October 2016 |title=Reconsidering the Standard Plate Size |magazine=Plates |publisher=[[Automobile License Plate Collectors Association]] |volume=62 |number=5}} Guam adopted these standards in 1960. ==Passenger baseplates== ===1947 to 1964=== {|class="wikitable" |- !Image !Dates issued !Design !Serial format !Serials issued !Notes |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |1947 |Hand-stenciled black on white; "GUAM" at left and "1947" at right |1234 |1 to approximately 2200 | |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |1948 |Embossed black on golden yellow with border line; "GUAM" at left and "1948" at right |1234 |1 to approximately 4200 |First embossed plate. |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |1949 |Embossed white on blue with border line; "GUAM" at left and "1949" at right |1234 |1 to approximately 8500 | |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |{{nowrap|1950–51}} |Embossed orange on black with border line; "GUAM" at left and "1950" at right |1234 |1 to approximately 9900 |Revalidated for 1951 with silver tabs. |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1953 13793.png|150px]] |1952–54 |Embossed black on orange with border line; "GUAM" at left and "1952" at right |12345 |1 to approximately 13800 |Revalidated for 1953 with silver tabs, and for 1954 with black tabs. |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1955 permanent.png|150px]] |1955–56 |Embossed white on dark green with border line; "GUAM" at left and "1955" at right |12345 |1 to approximately 14000 |Revalidated for 1956 with black tabs. |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1957 dealer.png|150px]] |1957–58 |Embossed black on yellow with border line; "GUAM" at left and "1957" at right |12-345 |1 to approximately
14-800 |Revalidated for 1958 with black tabs. |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |1959 |Embossed white on dark green with border line; "GUAM" at left and "1959" at right |12-345 |1 to approximately
13-900 | |- |[[File:1960 Guam license plate.png|150px]] |1960 |Embossed black on white with border line; "19 GUAM 60" at bottom |12-345 |1 to approximately
14-000 |First 6" x 12" plate. |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1961 graphic.png|150px]] |1961 |Embossed white on black with border line; "19 GUAM 61" at bottom |12-345 |1 to approximately
14-100 | |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1962 graphic.png|150px]] |1962 |Embossed black on orange with border line; "19 GUAM 62" at bottom |12-345 |1 to approximately
17-900 | |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1963 graphic.png|150px]] |1963 |Embossed black on white with border line; "19 GUAM 63" at bottom |12-345 |1 to approximately
20-000 | |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1964 17437.png|150px]] |1964 |Embossed white on blue with border line; "19 GUAM 64" at bottom |12345 |1 to approximately 17500 | |} ===1965 to present=== Since 1996, all passenger plates have featured a round mounting hole at the top right and horizontal slots in the other three corners, as with plates of Hawaii and the Northern Marianas. {|class="wikitable" |- !Image !Dates issued !Design !Slogan !Serial format !Serials issued !Notes |- |[[File:1967 Guam license plate.jpg|150px]] |1965–69 |Embossed blue on white with border line |Hafa Adai |12345 |1 to approximately 38800 | |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1970 55137.png|150px]] |1970–73 |Embossed golden yellow on dark green with border line; [[latte stone]] graphics at left and right |America's Day Begins In Guam USA |12345 |1 to approximately 55200 | |- |rowspan="2"|[[File:GUAM 1978 passenger license plate Flickr - woody1778a.jpg|150px]] |1974–77 |rowspan="2"|Embossed black on reflective white with border line; "74" at bottom left |rowspan="4"|Hafa Adai |12-345 |1 to approximately 57-500 |rowspan="4"| |- |1977–78 |rowspan="3"|12345 |57501 to approximately 61000 |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |1978–80 |As above, but without "74" |61001 to approximately 72500 |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |1980–82 |As above, but with shorter [[Die (manufacturing)|die]]s |72501 to approximately 83500 |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1983 52787.png|150px]] |1983–86 |Embossed blue on reflective white with border line; [[Bullock cart|ox cart]] graphic at bottom left |Hub of the Pacific |12345 |1 to approximately 87000 | |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1986 ACC 559.png|150px]] |1986–93 |Embossed dark green on reflective white; graphic in center featuring pale green map and two green latte stones |Hafa Adai |ABC 123 |AAA 001 to approximately AFN 999 | |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1994 CHP 2294.png|150px]] |1994 – February 26, 2009 |Embossed black on reflective white; gold map graphic in center |Tano Y Chamorrohttp://www.guampedia.com/origin-of-chamorro-as-an-ethnic-identifier/ |Coded by municipality: *''ABC''1234 (variable number of digits following letters) *''ABC''123A (following exhaustion of above format) |Varies by village: *''ABC'' 1 to ''ABC''9999 *''ABC''001A to present | |- |[[File:Guam license plate 2012 TU 250.png|150px]] |February 27, 2009[http://guam.mvarietynews.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=4762:drt-launches-new-license-plates-&catid=1:guam-local-news&Itemid=2 "DRT launches new license plates"] – present |Embossed black on reflective white; graphic in center featuring gray latte stone and three red [[bougainvillea]] flowers |Tano Y Chamorro |Coded by municipality: *''AB'' 1234 | | |} ==Coding== ===Passenger, 1994=== On the 1994 base, the letters of passenger plate serials indicated the [[Villages of Guam|village]] of issuance. These three-letter codes were displayed in a smaller font size than was the numerical portion of the plate serial. {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Village !Code |- |[[Hagåtña, Guam|Agana]] |AGA |- |[[Agat, Guam|Agat]] |AGT |- |[[Agana Heights, Guam|Agana Heights]] |AHT |- |[[Asan, Guam|Asan]] |ASA |- |[[Barrigada, Guam|Barrigada]] |BAR |- |[[Chalan Pago-Ordot, Guam|Chalan Pago]] |CHP |- |[[Dededo, Guam|Dededo]] |DED |- |[[Inarajan, Guam|Inarajan]] |INA |- |[[Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Guam|Maite]] |MAI |- |[[Mangilao, Guam|Mangilao]] |MAN |- |[[Merizo, Guam|Merizo]] |MER |- |[[Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Guam|Mongmong]] |MNG |- |[[Chalan Pago-Ordot, Guam|Ordot]] |ORD |- |[[Piti, Guam|Piti]] |PIT |- |[[Sinajana, Guam|Sinajana]] |SNJ |- |[[Santa Rita, Guam|Santa Rita]] |STR |- |[[Talofofo, Guam|Talofofo]] |TAL |- |[[Tamuning, Guam|Tamuning]] |TAM |- |[[Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Guam|Toto]] |TOT |- |[[Tumon]] |TUM |- |[[Umatac, Guam|Umatac]] |UMA |- |[[Yigo, Guam|Yigo]] |YIG |- |[[Yona, Guam|Yona]] |YON |} On the 2009 base, the letters of passenger plate serials again indicate the village of issuance. These two-letter codes are displayed in the same font size as is the numerical portion of the plate serial. {{Expand list|date=September 2016}} {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Village !Code |- |Agat |AT |- |[[Asan, Guam|Asan]] |AN |- |Barrigada |BR |- |[[Dededo, Guam|Dededo]] |DE |- |[[Hagåtña, Guam|Hagåtña]] |HG |- |[[Inarajan, Guam|Inarajan]] |IN |- |Mangilao |MN |- |[[Merizo, Guam|Merizo]] |ME |- |[[Piti, Guam|Piti]] |PT |- |Talofofo |TL |- |Toto |TO |- |[[Tumon]] |TU |- |Tamuning |TM |- |Umatac |UM |- |[[Yigo, Guam|Yigo]] |YG |- |Yona |YN |} ===Non-passenger=== On the 1994 base, commercial [[truck]] plates were coded by location of issuance, but using a different geographical coding system than for passenger plates. These codes were based on more specific geographical areas or geographical features, rather than political jurisdictions. Bus, dealer, taxi, and trailer plates were coded only by type, not location of issuance. {|class=wikitable |- !Image !Type !Serial format !Code !Location |- |rowspan="6"|[[File:GUAM 1999 COMMERCIAL TRUCK license plate Flickr - woody1778a.jpg|150px]] |rowspan="6"|Commercial [[Truck]] |rowspan="6"|1234''ABC'' |FAP |Fort Apugan ([[Hagåtña, Guam|Hagåtña]]) |- |FSO |Fort Soledad, [[Umatac]] |- |MLL |[[Mount Lamlam]] |- |PDE |[[Plaza de España (Hagåtña)]] |- |TFL |[[Talofofo Falls]], [[Talofofo]] |- |TLP |Two Lovers Point ([[Tumon]]) |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |[[Bus]] |'''BUS''' 123 |BUS |rowspan=5|all |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |[[Car dealership|Dealer]] |'''DLR''' 123 |DLR |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1983 government.png|150px]]
[[File:Guam license plate 1986 government.png|150px]]
[[File:Guam license plate 1994 government.png|150px]] |[[Government of Guam]] |1234 |''none'' |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |[[Taxicab|Taxi]] |'''TXI''' 123 |TXI |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |[[Trailer (vehicle)|Trailer]] |1234 {{small|'''TRL'''}} |TRL |} ==Optional plates== {|class=wikitable |- !Image !Type !First issued !Design !Serial format !Notes |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |[[Veteran]]—[[United States Air Force]] | |Blue on reflective white with full-color graphics of the [[flag of the United States]] and the [[flag of Guam]] |'''AF''' 123 | |- |[[File:Blank License Plate Shape.svg|150px]] |Veteran—[[United States Navy]] | |Blue on reflective white with full-color graphics of the flag of the United States and the flag of Guam |'''N''' 123 | |} ==Other plates== {|class="wikitable" |- !Image !Type !First issued !Design !Slogan !Serial format !Notes |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1986 consular.png|150px]] |Consular |1986 |As 1986–93 passenger base |Hafa Adai | | |- |[[File:Guam license plate 1960s naval base.png|150px]] |[[Naval Base Guam|Naval Base]] |1960 |White on yellow | |1234 | |} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.plateshack.com/y2k/Guam/guy2k.html Plateshack.com - Guam Y2K] {{Vehicle registration plates of the United States}} {{Oceania in topic|Vehicle registration plates of}} {{Guam}} [[Category:Vehicle registration plates of the United States|+Guam]] [[Category:Guam-related lists]]
